contents:
[li]With one constituency left to declare, the Conservatives have 364 seats, Labour 203, the SNP 48, the Liberal Democrats 11, the DUP 8, Sinn Fein 7, Plaid Cymru 4, the SDLP 2, the Green Party 1, the Alliance Party 1, the Brexit Party 0[/li]


保守黨 364 +66
工黨 203 -42
蘇格蘭民族黨 48 +13
自民黨 11 -10

還有一些小黨地盤基本沒變

https://www.bbc.com/news/election-2019-50749490
